colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA DZA SAG THU RGYAL PO MAnI BADZRA NAS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^DAM PA'I MTSAN GYI BYIN GYI RLABS PA SH'AKYA'I DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI RANG SNANG GANG 'DOD DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI KHU BO CHOS RJE MKHAN PO YE SHES DGE LEGS SO,, ,,)
